alert.note: Alert for City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:49PM EDT until May 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON...NORTHWESTERN HERTFORD...NORTHWESTERN GATES...SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...SOUTHAMPTON AND EAST CENTRAL SUSSEX COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FRANKLIN AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 449 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Franklin, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Franklin, Courtland and Hunterdale around 500 PM EDT. Carrsville around 505 PM EDT. Sedley around 510 PM EDT. Zuni around 520 PM EDT. Ivor around 525 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vicksville, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Mapleton, Dort, Dory, Sunbeam, Lees Mill, Bartonsville and Riverdale. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Sussex
